Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/34th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Archer, Damen, Pershing and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/34th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Archer, Damen, Pershing and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/34th.

Allow extra travel time.
